    Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    Stack<T>
    Generic stack implementation using an array.
    StackEmptyException
    Exception thrown when attempting to pop or peek from an empty stack.
    StackFullException
    Exception thrown when attempting to push an element onto a full stack.
    StackTest
    Test class for the generic Stack.
